data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I've noticed that you are always mixing up the twins, Timmy and Connor. When ____ do ____, ____ annoys ____, ____ they ____ to ____ of ____ as ____. Here's a tip ____ help ____. Timmy is slightly taller, and Connor's hair is a little bit longer.
data.partBlankContent: I've noticed that you are always mixing up the twins, Timmy and Connor. When y__ do th__, i_ annoys th__, a_ they li__ to th___ of thems_____ as indiv______. Here's a tip t_ help reme____. Timmy is slightly taller, and Connor's hair is a little bit longer.
data.answer: 我注意到你总是把双胞胎搞混，蒂米和康纳。当你这样做的时候，这会惹恼他们，因为他们喜欢认为自己是独立的。这里有一个帮助记忆的小窍门。Timmy稍微高一些，Connor的头发稍微长一些。
